Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-0914 affecting package opencryptoki for versions less than 3.24.0-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-0914 affecting package opencryptoki for versions less than 3.24.0-3. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package opencryptoki is earlier than 3.24.0-3, affected by CVE-2024-0914
